notes.title: Authors’ contributions
notes.p: DS designed the study, with input from IJO and JKA. NR substantially aided DS in the design of the search strategy and its adaptation to multiple databases. This manuscript was written by DS, IJO, and JKA. The authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Authors’ information
sec.p: DS is a research pharmacist at UMC and reading for a DPhil in Evidence-Based Health Care at the University of Oxford, Nuffield Departments of Primary Care and Continuing Education, Oxford, UK.
JKA is a physician and clinical pharmacologist working at the Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine in the Nuffield Department of Primary Care Health Sciences, University of Oxford, Oxford, UK.
IJO is an MD, with an MSc and DPhil in Evidence-Based Health Care from the University of Oxford, Oxford, UK.
